body_html:
It seems tricky to implement and propagate named dimensions across all operations.

I'm concerned that it complicates the rules for broadcasting because now you have to handle numbered dimensions, named dimensions, and a combination of the two.

I don't see how this fixes the assumptions in batch norm: you still have to make assumptions about whether new dimensions are treated as part of the 'batch' or not. For example, 'stream' and 'channel' probably would be folded into the batch dimension, but 'time' should not.
